title: 254: Lisa Vanderpump is a Boss Broad!
itunes:title: 254: Lisa Vanderpump is a Boss Broad!
description:
The Broads are at Villa Rosa and chatting with the queen of reality tv (and so much more) Lisa Vanderpump! They chat about her life this past year, dealing with grief, making a marriage work, when to walk away, soulmates, finding your self worth, learning how to balance, starting to take medication & mental health, “all that is gold does not glitter”, being a child actor, what wasn’t brought up on the Real Housewives, and more! Show LVP that #broadsquad love!

LISA VANDERPUMP:

Check out her podcast

“All Things Vanderpump”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/all-things-vanderpump/id1529375610

Follow her on instagram: 

https://www.instagram.com/lisavanderpump/
